product.imagesRequired: At least one image is required

product.skuFormat: SKU must contain only letters, numbers, or hyphens.

user.passwordRequired: Password must be at least 6 characters.

package.name: Name *

businessProfile.title: Business Profile
businessProfile.description: Manage your business information and settings
businessProfile.saveWarning: Some fields are incomplete, but you can still save
businessProfile.saveSuccess: Save all changes to your business profile

branding.title: Branding Settings
branding.aboutPrimaryColorDescription: This color will be used as the main brand color across your website. The system will automatically generate 10 shades (50-900) from light to dark for consistent theming.
branding.headerAlignmentDescription: Choose how header elements are aligned on your website
branding.thisGradientWillBeUsed: This gradient will be used across your website

paymentSettings.title: Paymob Payment Settings
paymentSettings.useDashboardSettings: Use dashboard settings instead of environment variables
paymentSettings.apiKeyDescription: Your Paymob API key from the dashboard
paymentSettings.walletIntegrationIdDescription: Integration ID for wallet payments (optional, will use Card ID if not provided)
paymentSettings.iframeIdDescription: Iframe ID for card payment page
paymentSettings.hmacSecretPlaceholder: Enter HMAC secret for webhook security
paymentSettings.callbackUrlDescription: Base URL for callbacks (optional, auto-generated if not provided)
paymentSettings.responseCallbackUrlDescription: URL for user redirect after payment (optional)
paymentSettings.importantNotesDescription: When Paymob settings are enabled from the dashboard, these values will be used instead of environment variables. Make sure to enter all required values correctly.

paymentMethodSettings.title: Payment Method Settings
paymentMethodSettings.walletAccountNumberDescription: Wallet account number to display on checkout page
paymentMethodSettings.onlyEnabledMethods: Only enabled payment methods will be displayed on the website checkout page
paymentMethodSettings.walletRequiresAccount: Wallet payment requires account number to be displayed to customers
paymentMethodSettings.paymobRequiresSettings: Paymob payment also requires Paymob settings to be configured
paymentMethodSettings.changesSavedOnProfile: Changes are saved when you save the business profile

seoMeta.title: SEO Settings
seoMeta.metaTitleEnPlaceholder: Enter SEO meta title in English (50-60 characters recommended)
seoMeta.metaTitleArPlaceholder: Enter SEO title in Arabic (50-60 characters recommended)
seoMeta.metaDescriptionEnPlaceholder: Enter SEO meta description in English (150-160 characters recommended)
seoMeta.metaDescriptionArPlaceholder: Enter SEO description in Arabic (150-160 characters recommended)
seoMeta.metaKeywordsPlaceholder: Enter keywords separated by commas (e.g., business, company, services)
seoMeta.baseUrlDescription: Base URL of your website (used for generating absolute URLs)
seoMeta.canonicalUrlDescription: Canonical URL for SEO (defaults to base URL if not specified)
seoMeta.metaTagsPlaceholder:
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Your Site Name">
seoMeta.metaTagsDescription: Enter one or more meta tags as HTML. Each tag on a new line. Examples:
seoMeta.noCustomMetaTags: No custom meta tags added yet
seoMeta.head: Head
seoMeta.scriptPlaceholder: Enter JavaScript or HTML code here...
seoMeta.usedForSocialSharing: Used for Open Graph, Twitter Card, and other social media sharing

menuLink.title: Manage Menu Links
menuLink.keyRequired: Key is required and must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores.
menuLink.urlRequired: URL is required for text links.
menuLink.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{key}}"?

hero.endDateRequired: End date is required for scheduled heroes.
